original_title: NPP, SJB, ITAK, DTNA and SLLP share seats in Vanni District
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Vanni District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 20% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 39,894 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 32,232 votes (16.45%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 2 seats in the district while the SJB, ITAK, DTNA and SLLP have won one seat each in the district.
